description: You strike the terrible beast hard. Your weapon breaks in half.
A decoration pops off your weapon with impact to foe's side
You are daunted by the beast's gaze and swing weakly.
This terrible creature's hide deflects the strongest blows.
Solid strike to foe's side with your common weapon fails to penetrate.
Your strike was more of a last minute parry to avoid the beast's.
Two light and quick shots to foe's forearm, provides a modest result.
Strike foe's neck with the flat of your weapon during a moment of opportunity.
Solid strike on foe's leg. You move quickly away to avoid the retaliation.
Solid strike to foe's head just bounces off.
Violent strike to foe's forearm. Foe is bruised. Your weapon must make a breakage check.
Well placed and hard. Try a vital spot next time.
Blow severs vein and artery in foe's upper leg. He drops and dies after 12 inactive rounds. Awesome!
You step into the right spot and rip open foe's side. Your blow shatters some ribs.
Glancing strike to foe's abdomen loses much of the impact on foe's hide.
Your weapon wounds deep and cuts muscles and tendons. Foe's wound bleeds heavily.
Foe presents a weak spot and you strike. Blow lands at the base of the neck. Tendons are damaged.
When your strike lands on foe's back, bones crackle and pop. Internal damage is certain.
Foe lowers his eyes within your reach and you strike with great skill and fury. He is blinded.
Your weapon is knocked from your hand. It will take 2 rounds to recover.
Your weapon hits at a bad angle. Check weapon strength check. Bum luck.
Your blow was deflected, but you gain the initiative next round.
Glancing side blow. A spark of light reminds you your weapon is magical.
Foe is unbalanced. You gain the initiative next round.
You deal out a sharp and hard leg strike. Foe steps back to look at his leg.
Blow to foe's back. Foe's hide is tough there. You need more strength.
You step under foe's lunge and use the force against him. Strike to under belly. He feels the pain instantly.
Blow to thigh leaves a bad bruise. Your weapon cracks and bends. It will break after one more strike.
Minor forearm wound.The beast used its forearm for defense. Foe soaks up the damage.
Blow to foe's arm joint lands poorly. Foe will have a bruise. You think that you know what went wrong.
Blow is placed solidly against foe's side. The thick hide there protects him well.
You are a mighty warrior. Your strike hits foe's neck and breaks it. Bones are crushed and the spine in broken. Foe drops in 1 round and dies.
A little bird shows you the flaw in foe's armor. Your strike plunges into this vulnerable spot killing foe instantly.
Wound foe along his side with an excellent strike. Foe leaps back away from your weapon.
You pop foe on his head with some useful results. Foe is confused just long enough for a blow.
Solid shot to foe's chest. Foe is down. You take an 'A' Unbalancing Critical result, because you are so close.
Rip open foe's abdomen. Blood covers you. This cruel wound will not be healed easily.
You leap up and slam foe in the eye. He does not realize he is dead yet. Next round he will. Your weapon is stuck for a round.
Your strike is powerful. You fumble the rest of the round.
Your weapon lands uneven across foe's shoulder. Make a breakage check.
Acceptable strike to foe's leg.You gain the initiative next round.
Glancing blow smears mithril like chalk across beast's hide.
Solid, but nowhere near a vital spot. Bruise foe's calf muscle.
Strike lands on foe's horn. The vibration has some effect.
Your strike thumps foe on his nose. He is insulted, but not wounded badly.
Shin strike. Skin is torn open and bone is bruised. This one hurts. You have initiative.
Hammering foe's thigh gets you some respect. You have the initiative.
Blow to foe's upper arm. This strike had few vices, but it was weak. Get it together.
Your strike hit no vitals, but you can hear the ribs in foe's side crackle. Foe fights on in some pain.
Slash at foe's neck fails to land very hard. You have the initiative for 2 rounds.
Blow to lower skull area. Foe dies instantly. He stumbles on for 1 round, until he realizes this.
Crush the bones in foe's neck with a mighty blow. Foe drops and dies in 1 round.
Graceful assault knocks down foe's defenses. He just cannot get his guard up.
Incredible strike across foe's calf trips him to the ground. The bigger they are.…
Brutal strike to foe's side. You rip him open and he is hating life. His blood gets all over you.
Vicious blow to foe's leg. You can hear the mithril in your weapon talking, as you rip foe open.
Awe inspiring strike drives bone through both lungs. Foe realizes his doom before falling into a coma. He dies in 18 rounds.
Your strike is powerful, but your grip was terrible. Roll a fumble for yourself.
Blow foe's arm. Ready for a better strike. You gain the initiative next round.
Back strike. Weapon seems to damage by touch only.
Your strike is solid and flat, but foe is not slowed at all.
You strike the fell titan in the chest. He yells back at you.
You step under his assault and strike him hard in the abdomen.
The vile beast leans foward. You strike at his snout in frantic response.
Your blow lands against foe's shoulder. You are pleased with the effect. Blood pours from the wound.
Hard blow to foe's thigh. He stumbles, but does not fall. You have the initiative next round.
Catch foe in his exposed leg. You come down hard on it. He will have a bruise. It slows him. You have the initiative.
To make this strike land well, you almost climb onto foe. You deal out a brutal srike to his neck and leap back.
You have a uncomfortable opportunity to strike foe in his mouth. If foe has a breath weapon, he may not use it.
Weapon bites into foe's skull. He just comes apart. He dies in 6 rounds. Your weapon is stuck. Foe rolls over and takes your weapon out of reach. All allies get (+10)
Strike through foe's heart kills him instantly. You are too close. He pins you under him as he dies.
Brutal strike to foe's forearm. He reels from your presence. You are his bane.
Vicious blow to forehead sends foe to the ground. If he falls on stone, he is in a coma.
Strike to foe's abdomen. Foe has the biggest bruise you have ever seen.
You duck around foe's side and catch him in the ear. Blow collapses skull. Foe dies of massive brain damage in 3 rounds.
Your mighty blow is the stuff epics are made of. Foe's spine is broken. He dies in 2 rounds.
The numbing recoil of your strike to foe's chest sends you stumbling back.
Strike lands at a bad angle. You check for weapon breakage.
Blow to back. You gain the initiative next round.
Sparks fly from your weapon as it embraces your foe.
Boom! Solid without question. Try a vital spot next time.
Rip sinew, hair, horn and scale with a glancing blow to side.
Unexpected weak spot found with your strike to foe's side.
Your weapon seems to dig into foe's chest and devour his heart. Foe dies instantly. You are covered with blood.
Flat strike to foe's upper body. Heavy blow breaks some bones. Foe's guard is down.
Hard glancing strike crosses foe's shoulder and chest. Shoulder is slashed and chest is bruised.
Just when your swing looked to be failing your weapon took control and crashed into foe's thigh.
Your master strike lands against foe's neck. Doom is in his face. He drops and dies in 3 rounds.
Your weapon plunges into foe's chest making the nature of its forging certain. He dies a terrible and swift death. Take 12 rounds to reclaim your weapon.
Foe's eye is in reach and you ram your weapon home. Foe dies after 3 rounds of inactivity. You have half the round left.
Strike to foe's leg severs a vein and tears muscles. Foe flails around for 6 rounds before he dies.
Awesome blow to foe's neck. His neck and back are broken. Foe drops and suffocates in 12 rounds.
Clean strike to foe's eye kills him in one round. He fights on for 1 round before he realizes he is dead.
Foe steps right into your swing. You tear open foe's abdomenal and drop him in a heap. You are entangled in his fall. Foe dies in 4 rounds from shock.
Strike to side kills foe after a chain reaction of bones shatter. You are covered with blood.
